name: Shot The Block!
description:
SHOT THE BLOCK!!

Have you ever played Tetris? Well, the space soldier that you're controlling too, but maybe playing it from the insides of a Spaceship and shooting the blocks to play isn't the easiest way!

Help to keep the blocks from escaping and shot them!!

Made in under 48 hours for the Mix and Game Jam 2020 with the Theme of 

Mixed Genres.

THE HTML5 VERSION HAS SOME LITTLE VISUAL ERRORS, IT DOESNT HAPPEN IN THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION!

Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/Paraxodon
